reviewText: This game is great for toddlers that just started playing on a computer. Love it <3
Does the job for kids: learning mouse mouvement and fundamental AAA gameplay: click here to win!".\n\nThe shape recognition works alright as well."

This game works great for children as an introduction to computers. It allows for clicking, reading (with speaking for children that cant read), drawing and puzzle solving.

Not for older children and may be a little expensive for Â£7 however if you can find it in a sale and you have a child that wants to play games with you then I would highly recomend.

The puzzles are simple enough to complete most simply by playing the game in an exploratory fashion however there is a challenge to find all the puzzles for each level which will allow for more of a goal as your child gets older.

Recommended age: 3-8 (Depending on your childs abilities)
